data.title: Examining 2020 Presidential Election voter turnout in Western Village of Lake in the Hills: Precinct Grafton 36
data.meta_description: With less than 12 months until the 2024 U.S. Presidential Election, a McHenry Times analysis of Illinois voter history data shows 647 voters in Western Village of Lake in the Hills: Precinct Grafton 36 cast ballots four years ago, in 2020.
data.text:
As we approach the 2024 U.S. Presidential Election, a review of the 2020 voting patterns in Western Village of Lake in the Hills: Precinct Grafton 36 can provide valuable insights. In the contest between Donald J. Trump and Joe Biden, 647 of the 818 residents cast their ballots, resulting in a 79.1% turnout, according to the Illinois State Board of Elections.

The voting breakdown in Western Village of Lake in the Hills: Precinct Grafton 36 reveals 47% of the total supporting Republicans, and 51.1% of the votes for Democrats, highlighting the precinct's political preferences.

Overall, 171 registered voters in Western Village of Lake in the Hills: Precinct Grafton 36 did not vote in 2020.

Additionally, an estimated total of 943 residents were reported to be aged 18 or older in Western Village of Lake in the Hills: Precinct Grafton 36, according to the last US Census and the 2021 American Community Survey.

The Illinois State Board of Elections ensures the integrity and security of the electoral process in Illinois. They handle candidate certifications, vote tallying, and campaign disclosures. Following a significant cyberattack in 2016, the board also focuses on bolstering electoral cybersecurity. Governed by the Illinois Election Code (10 ILCS 5), the SBE is committed to conducting fair and transparent elections.
